headline: Why Quanta (PWR) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of infrastructure solutions provider Quanta (NYSE:PWR) fell 1.3% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs. Investors reacted to a federal court ruling that most of President Trump's global tariffs were illegal, raising uncertainty over trade policy and the fiscal impact of potential refunds. Rising Treasury yields added to the pressure, with the 10-year climbing above 4.2% and
